title: Plant-Based on the Rails: Planted x Deutsche Bahn
excerpt: Now serving planted products on ICE trains across Germany. Sustainable travel just got more delicious.
content: Getting from A to B shouldn't cost the planet. Deutsche Bahn already offers one of the most sustainable ways to travel â€” and now, with planted products in their onboard restaurants, passengers can enjoy a climate-friendly meal while they're at it. Our planted.chicken dishes are now available on select ICE routes, making it easier than ever to eat well while traveling well.
author: Planted Team
